### Database Migrations

<!-- If you made database schema changes, check this and provide details -->

- [ ] This PR includes database migrations

**Migration files:**

- [ ] Applied to local: `wrangler d1 execute DB_NAME --local --file=migrations/XXXX.sql`
- [ ] Tested migration rollback strategy
- [ ] Updated docs/DATABASE_SETUP.md

**⚠️ Warning:** Database migrations require manual execution in staging and production environments.
